character.age: 250 years old (appears to be in mid-30s)
character.role: Main Protagonist and Leader of the Shadowhand Clan
character.background: Aethon was born into a noble house within the underdark city of Menzoberranzan. From a young age, he demonstrated exceptional skill in stealth and magic, quickly rising through the ranks of his family's clan. However, after discovering a dark secret about his family's past, Aethon defected from his own kin and formed the Shadowhand Clan, vowing to bring justice and balance to the underdark.
